description: Try our easy to follow Bbq Pineapple With Smoky Rum Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bbq Pineapple With Smoky Rum Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small pineapple, peeled, cut into wedges (see tip)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sugar with cinnamon, cardamom and cloves in a shallow dish. Add pineapple wedges and turn to coat. Set aside for 20 minutes.
Preheat a barbecue grill on mediumhigh heat. Remove pineapple from sugar mix. Add rum and maple syrup to remaining sugar mix, stirring to dissolve sugar.
Cook pineapple wedges for about 5 minutes each side or until lightly charred. Drizzle with rum sauce and scatter with mint leaves. Serve with minted yoghurt.
